---
--- Generated by EmmyLua(https://github.com/EmmyLua)
--- Created by liuyubao.
--- DateTime: 2022/2/9 14:12
---@class SkillAnalysis
local SkillAnalysis = {}

SkillAnalysis.classMap = {
    ["34301"] = "battle/specialSkillCon/skillcon/34301",
}



function SkillAnalysis:getSpecialSkillData(skillId)
    if self.classMap and self.classMap[skillId] then
        local c =  require_path(skillId, self.classPath[skillId])
        return SkillData:new(c)
    else
        BattleLog.error("SkillAnalysis 文件 没有配置  ",skillId ," 数据 ")
        return nil
    end
end

---@param skillId
function SkillAnalysis:getSkillData(skillId)
    local con = ConfigUtils:getSkill_BaseCon(skillId)
    if con then
        if con.type == Enum_Battle.SkillType.Skill_special then
            return self:getSpecialSkillData(skillId)
        end
        return SkillData:new(con)
    else
        return nil
    end
end

return SkillAnalysis
